data.meta_site_name: NENJP - New England Network for Justice for Palestine
data.text:
Friday, March 29, 7:00 PM EDT - Livestream and in person at the Community Church of Boston, 565 Boylston St. (Copley Sq), Boston MA (View)

David Rovics: Notes From a Holocaust

We welcome the music voice that has most performed at Community Church of Boston, as his work and his values are most strikingly in line with community Church of Boston's Peace and Justice focus. Every time David is anywhere near Boston, we drop everything to host this phenomenal voice for our Movement!

Online Access Information - This is a free concert, but we encourage you to purchase a ticket or make a freewill donation to the performer....Paypal and Venmo option will be supplied.

Zoom Link: Launch Meeting - Zoom
